body:
### Stopduino
The stopduino is an Arduino based project based off of this [instructable](http://www.instructables.com/id/Arduino-stoplight-web-server/). 

### What is the Stopduino?
The Stopduino is a stoplight made by myself in which the lights (also made by me) are controlled over an Arduino Ethernet which is then controlled over the internet. 

### What was this for?
I made this project during my time at the BlueStamp Engineering program. During this program students choose a project and are then given the resources and the help to be able to build this project. Videos of the project in action can be seen [here](http://www.bluestampengineering.com/author/sfishman/).

### The Code
The code for the Stopduino runs on Arduino 1.0.1

### The Design
Initially the original design I made was to hard to make with the limited resources I have. If you were to have sheet metal and some way to bend it properly and weld it together that would be ideal. Unfortunately I didn't have that so I made do with pvc pipe.

If you have any problems while making the Stopduino feel free to email me at sfishman96@gmail.com with questions
